item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1597; 08:20PM; 744 S Catalina St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Z2Jjqi; Koreatown; KNOCKDOWN: The first arriving assignment of 32 firefighters extinguished the fire in 18 minutes with no injuries reported. They held the fire to one unit, preventing it from extending into the attic. Firefighters will be on scene conducting overhaul operations to address any water issues on the floor below. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E20 E203 E210 E211 E220 E229 E29 E3 E6 EM11 HR3 RA13 RA3 SQ21 T10 T11 T20 T29 T3 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1597; 08:02PM; 744 S Catalina St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Z2Jjqi; Koreatown; Four story, center-hall apartment building with light smoke showing upon LAFD arrival. Firefighters entered the offensive mode and made entry into the building, finding moderate to heavy smoke on the 4th floor and located fire in one unit. Two additional task forces requested (not reflected in this alert).; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 E211 E229 E29 E6 RA13 SQ21 T11 T29; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Outside Fire; INC#1099; 03:09PM; 12260 W Van Nuys Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CgidSN; Lake View Terrace; LAFD is on scene with LA County Fire Dept resources at a large hay pile fire. It is approximately 25' x 50' pile of hay about 20' deep, well involved in fire. Heavy equipment are moving the hay bales so firefighters can more effectively apply water. There are no structures exposed and no ember cast creating any hazards. The 9-1-1 call was received at 2:06PM. ; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E298 E77 E91 T98; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Cliff Rescue - FATALITY; INC#0803; 11:12AM; 1 Point Fermin; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nw6hUE; San Pedro; At 10:38AM, LAFD received call from LA County Lifeguard of a possible fatality (age/gender unknown) at the base of the cliff near Sunken City. The victim was located and the LA County Sheriff Dept helicopter, which was closest, is conducting a hoist operation to retrieve the body. LAFD Air Ops was canceled. Any questions regarding the incident are referred to law enforcement for the investigation and LA County Coroner for patient identification. LAPD Inc# 1828 Harbor Division. No further details.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; AO1 BC706 BT1 BT2 BT5 E101 E112 E248 E285 E36 E85 EM11 H2 H5 HA2 HA5 RA112 RH114 T48 T85 UR85 UR88; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - NOW OUT; INC#1106; 04:24PM; 7240 N Lankershim Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jCrUoh; Sun Valley; FIRE NOW OUT: Large, two story apartment building with smoke showing from one unit on the 2nd floor. Firefighters entered the offensive mode and quickly extinguished the fire in one unit on the 2nd floor. One patient is being evaluated. The 9-1-1 call was received at 4PM. No further details.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E289 E77 RA60 RA89 T60 T89; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1002; 03:13PM; 14639 W Friar St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VxeLtP; Van Nuys; KNOCKDOWN:18 firefighters extinguished the fire in 24 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to the fire unit on the first floor. Additional resources were requested but the knockdown was achieved prior to their arrival. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details. ; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E239 E39 E81 RA39 T39; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1002; 02:49PM; 14639 W Friar St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VxeLtP; Van Nuys; Two story, center hall (over parking) apartment building with smoke showing from one unit. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E239 E39 E81 RA39 T39; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Trapped Vehicle; INC#0565; 10:26PM; Sb 5 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GaLyzg; Granada Hills; Firefighters extricated the adult male patient from the rollover vehicle and is transporting him in critical condition. The 2nd patient (adult female from a different vehicle) declined LAFD transport. Any further questions are referred to CHP Log# 1003. No further details. ; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 E18 E275 E91 E98 EM15 HR3 RA75 RA91 T75 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Trapped Vehicle; INC#0565; 09:49AM; Sb 5 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GaLyzg; Granada Hills; One car roll-over with two patients. One patient is trapped and requires extrication (in at least serious condition) and one patient with non-life threatening injuries. CHP Log# 1003; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 E18 E275 E91 E98 EM15 HR3 RA75 RA91 T75 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Structure Fire, Auto Aid - With Injuries 12/30/2022 INC#0325

item.description: Structure Fire, Auto Aid - With Injuries; INC#0325; 08:31AM; 378 N Electric Ave; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IbEjd2; outside city; LAFD has two paramedic ambulances and one battalion command team assisting at a structure fire in the City of Alhambra. LAFD has been assigned care of two critical patients. Reports on scene of at least three critical patients including one pediatric. The total number of patients is not known (by LAFD). This is a Alhambra Fire Department incident and any questions are referred to that agency. No further details.; FS 50; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District outside city; BC2 RA1 RA47; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart
